high_descs: Walk forward and turn right to go to the trash can.
Pick up the lotion bottle from the trash can.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the lotion on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a lotion bottle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Walk across the room, then turn right and walk up to the small grey trash can.
Pick up the bottle of lotion out of the small grey trash can.
Turn right and begin walking to the counter, then turn right again and walk up to the tub, once at the tub turn left and walk over to the wall, then turn left and look up to face the toilet.
Place the bottle of lotion on the left side of the top of the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Move a bottle of lotion to the top of the toilet tank.

high_descs: Go forward and to the right to face the gray trash can.
Pick the bottle up from the gray trash can.
Turn and go to stand on the side of the toilet near the tub.
Put the bottle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a bottle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: walk forward, turn right, walk to the box in the corner
take the lotion bottle from the box
turn right, turn right, turn left to face the toilet
put the lotion bottle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: move lotion bottle from box to the back of the toilet

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the gray trash can in the corner.
Pick up the lotion bottle from the trash can.
Turn around and walk to the right side of the toilet.
Place the lotion bottle to the left of the green spray bottle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Place a lotion bottle on the back of the toilet.
